channel.title: Some Dementhium 639 Help! :)
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've noticed a bug on Dementhium 639 where when you talk to an NPC, and you walk away, the NPC just walks on the spot and faces wherever you go. Need help on that on how to fix it :S
Also would appreciate it if anyone knows how to EDIT an NPC name on a 639. Would thanks + rep.
Thanks :)
